a1: What is the best club in your opinion?
q2: I think the best might be Manchester United.
a2: I think the best club is Barcelona
a3: The best current team in recent memory has been Real Madrid but I believe with Madrid selling Ronaldo, it'll give FC Barcelona a chance.
q4: Can't FIFA based the ballon d'or on other criteria so as to ensure midfielders and great defenders win it even if they do not score?
a4: Whilst they could this might make previous year contenders frustrated and thus be unpopular
